Let's continue our commitment to driving innovation and excellence together.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • 50-State Surveys. We’ve worked on surveys on public accommodations laws for the Civil Rights and Discrimination Legal Center, right-to-work laws for the Employment Law Center, and distracted driving laws for the Car Accidents Legal Center.
  • Law Schools. We've been involved in developing a process to significantly broaden the range of content accessible to prospective law students through our Law Schools Center.

Justia Pet News

Ada, Machi and Pepe

Adamaris Betsabe, also known as Ada, is one year old; we rescued her from a litter of all-male kittens. Ada enjoys wrestling playfully with her dog brother before snuggling up. Machi (the Schnauzer) is short for "machihue", a Nahuatl word describing the water used to make tortillas. Jose Antonio, also known as Pepe, is Machi's son, and I rescued both of them when Pepe was just a few days old. Pepe, a unique breed, loves food and long walks. He appears twice in the photo, but don't think he is the favorite.

— Miguel Lopez

upcoming holidays

Dates to Remember
Benito Juarez’s Birthday
March 21st


Benito Juarez's birthday, observed on March 21st, honors the birth of a prominent Mexican leader. Born in 1806 in Oaxaca, Juarez became known for his efforts to modernize Mexico and promote democratic principles. His legacy as a promoter of justice and equality remains influential, making his birthday a day to remember his contributions to Mexican history and society.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia Super Bowl Challenge 2024

The Kansas City Chiefs secured a thrilling victory over the San Francisco 49ers with a score of 25-22 in overtime, winning the title of Super Bowl LVIII champions! A heartfelt thank you to everyone who enthusiastically participated in this year's edition. Congratulations to Jose Soto for the closest guess, Samuel Yang for the second closest guess, and Mayra for the third closest guess. Let's also acknowledge the honorable mention of Ken Chan and Rafael Peralta.
